Package com.tectonica.jonix.tabulate

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    FieldRowSupplier<P>
    an interface that corresponds a single logical field within an ONIX Product (e.g.
    FieldTabulator<P>
    An interface for representing a logical field within an ONIX Product.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    FieldTabulatorFactory<P>
    Utility class, which acts as a base-class for FieldTabulatorFactory.Singular and FieldTabulatorFactory.Plural, both of which are user-facing factories for creating FieldTabulator given the field's column names, tabulation function, and the amount of required occurrences.
    FieldTabulatorFactory.Plural<P>
    User-facing factory for creating a FieldTabulator given the field's column names, tabulation function, and the amount of required occurrences.
    FieldTabulatorFactory.Singular<P>
    User-facing factory for creating a FieldTabulator given the field's column names and tabulation function.
    JonixDelimitedWriter<P>
    Class that facilitates writing a char-delimited file where each line contains one ONIX Product.
    SimpleFieldTabulator<P>  
    Tabulation<P>
    This class contains a collection of FieldTabulators which together hold all the information needed to flatten an ONIX Product (which is a tree-like structure by its nature) into a flat-list of values (containing one or more logical fields).
